text: Motion
Motion
Hmm...
Meguru? What's wrong?

Producer...
I don't know what to do!!
It might be too late already...!
Eh!?
I see, it's for a birthday present.
Yeah...
I've been thinking about it for a while...

It's tricky, isn't it?
Because it's not about yourself.
Yeah, exactly.

I think there's a preference for giving things,
just like with food...

When it comes down to it,
I think food would be better.

But then, giving something that disappears
by the birthday...! I've thought about that too.

Yeah...
Food might be better suited for gifts or treats.
Yeah...

But you know, if you decide on a present
like clothes or accessories...?

In that case, it becomes about whether it
suits the person, and I want to avoid that...

Hmm?
Avoiding something that suits them?

N-No!
It's not like that!
What should I say...

Even if others think it's good, sometimes the
person themselves might not feel that way.

Even if they say "It suits you!"
 it might make them unsure of what to do...
It's a bit vague, but...!

Exactly, so I don't want to focus on that and just
want something they'll be happy to receive...
I see...!

In that case...
.......Hmm

Well, if you mean regardless of the
person themselves, then...
How about flowers...?
Flowers!!

Flowers are a classic for celebrations,
and there are ways to preserve them too.
That's true!
Yeah, yeah, that could work!
Giving a bouquet of flowers is kind of cool, right?
It's not something I can do on a regular basis!
Isn't it a bit cheesy?
No way! Not at all!

Since there are so many varieties, you can think
about what kind of flowers they might like...!

I think that's a great idea!
─So...!

I'd like to use that idea!
Is that okay?
